short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the Download Tab buttons location in 'ug' site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: On Ultimate Guitar website, moves the "Download Tab" button from the bottom of the page to the top, to prevent annoying scrolldowns when downloading GP tabs.
